OrgName: CGS-B, a wholly-owned subsidiary of Comtel Global Services, LLC (CGS)
activities: As a MSP hosting facility we do not collect or receive any customer's PII data. We request that all PII data be scrubbed or masked by the customer prior to that data being transmitted to CGS for hosted applications.
